verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַ֚ו <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנִ֨י <WH7133> unto them My offering לַחְמִ֜י <WH3899> [and] my bread לְאִשַּׁ֗י <WH801> for my sacrifices made by fire רֵ֚יחַ <WH7381> savour נִֽיחֹחִ֔י <WH5207> [for] a sweet תִּשְׁמְר֕וּ <WH8104> unto me shall ye observe לְהַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> to offer לִ֖י בְּמוֹעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH4150> unto me in their due season

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And thou shalt say לָהֶ֔ם זֶ֚ה <WH2088> This הָֽאִשֶּׁ֔ה <WH801> unto them This [is] the offering made by fire אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּקְרִ֖יבוּ <WH7126> which ye shall offer לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כְּבָשִׂ֨ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֧ה <WH8141> year תְמִימִ֛ם <WH8549> without spot שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two לַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> day by day עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> burnt offering תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [for] a continual

אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֥בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> The one תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou offer בַבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> and the other תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shalt thou offer בֵּ֥ין <WH996> at הָֽעַרְבָּֽיִם׃ <WH6153> at even

וַעֲשִׂירִ֧ית <WH6224> And a tenth הָאֵיפָ֛ה <WH374> [part] of an ephah סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> of flour לְמִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> for a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֛ה <WH1101> mingled בְּשֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> oil כָּתִ֖ית <WH3795> of beaten רְבִיעִ֥ת <WH7243> with the fourth הַהִֽין׃ <WH1969> [part] of an hin

עֹלַ֖ת <WH5930> burnt offering תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> [It is] a continual הָעֲשֻׂיָה֙ <WH6213> which was ordained בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> Sinai לְרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְנִסְכּוֹ֙ <WH5262> And the drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ת <WH7243> thereof [shall be] the fourth הַהִ֔ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for the one בַּקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy הַסֵּ֛ךְ <WH5258> to be poured נֶ֥סֶךְ <WH5262> [for] a drink offering שֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> [place] shalt thou cause the strong wine לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> And the other תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shalt thou offer בֵּ֣ין <WH996> at הָֽעַרְבָּ֑יִם <WH6153> at even כְּמִנְחַ֨ת <WH4503> as the meat offering הַבֹּ֤קֶר <WH1242> of the morning וּכְנִסְכּוֹ֙ <WH5262> and as the drink offering תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> thereof thou shalt offer אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> [it] a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וּבְיוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> And on the sabbath שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> two כְבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year תְּמִימִ֑ם <WH8549> without spot וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <WH6241> tenth סֹ֧לֶת <WH5560> deals of flour מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil וְנִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH5262> and the drink offering

עֹלַ֥ת <WH5930> [This is] the burnt offering שַׁבַּ֖ת <WH7676> of every sabbath בְּשַׁבַּתּ֑וֹ <WH7676> sabbath עַל־ <WH5921> addition עֹלַ֥ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> beside the continual וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבְרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> And in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <WH2320> of your months תַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> ye shall offer עֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God פָּרִ֨ים <WH6499> bullocks בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first בָקָ֤ר <WH1241> young שְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> two וְאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without spot

וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> And three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <WH6241> tenth deals סֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> of flour מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil לַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> bullock הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <WH6241> tenth סֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> deals of flour מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> ram הָֽאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> for one

וְעִשָּׂרֹ֣ן <WH6241> And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֗וֹן <WH6241> tenth סֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> of flour מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> unto one עֹלָה֙ <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> of a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֗ם <WH5262> And their drink offerings חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> shall be half הַהִין֩ <WH1969> an hin יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become לַפָּ֜ר <WH6499> unto a bullock וּשְׁלִישִׁ֧ת <WH7992> and the third הַהִ֣ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin לָאַ֗יִל <WH352> unto a ram וּרְבִיעִ֥ת <WH7243> and a fourth הַהִ֛ין <WH1969> [part] of an hin לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> unto a lamb יָ֑יִן <WH3196> of wine זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise עֹלַ֥ת <WH5930> this [is] the burnt offering חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> of every month בְּחָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH2320> throughout the months לְחָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH2320> the months הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> of the year

וּשְׂעִ֨יר <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> And one לְחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> for a sin offering לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> addition עֹלַ֧ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> beside the continual יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shall be offered וְנִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> month פֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> [is] the passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen י֛וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> of this month הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this חָ֑ג <WH2282> [is] the feast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> shall unleavened bread יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> be eaten

בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> In the first מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [shall be] an holy כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no manner of servile לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ye shall do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <WH7126> But ye shall offer אִשֶּׁ֤ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire עֹלָה֙ <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> bullocks בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first בָקָ֛ר <WH1241> young שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> two וְאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and one וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> and seven כְבָשִׂים֙ <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year תְּמִימִ֖ם <WH8549> they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> having לָכֶֽם׃

וּמִ֨נְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <WH6241> tenth deals לַפָּ֗ר <WH6499> for a bullock וּשְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֛ים <WH6241> tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> for a ram תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> shall ye offer

עִשָּׂר֤וֹן <WH6241> A several tenth deal עִשָּׂרוֹן֙ <WH6241> A tenth תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> shalt thou offer לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for every לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <WH7651> throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> lambs
וּשְׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> goat חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> And one לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> these beside the burnt offering הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לְעֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> which [is] for a continual תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> Ye shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

כָּאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> this תַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> After this manner ye shall offer לַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> daily שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> throughout the seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> the meat אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> of the sacrifice made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> addition עוֹלַ֧ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> beside the continual יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> it shall be offered וְנִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering
